old:
レオを中心とした決死隊はズールを倒すという華々
しい戦果を上げる一方で、新たなアークの出現を許し
てしまった。だが、最大の事件はレオの留守中に神殿
で起こったことだろう

　神殿は魔物の侵入を許してしまっていた。しかも小
賢しいことに魔物どもの破壊活動は陽動だったのだ

　あろうことか敵の目的はミシアルの誘拐だった。神
殿内の警備を強化していた騎士団が出し抜かれたのも
無理はない

　敵の中心にいて魔物を差配していたのは覚者イリス
だった。その姿を頼もしく感じる者がほとんどで、ま
さか彼女が敵側だとは誰も思わなかった

　イリスの要求はズールの命が納められた器とミシア
ルの交換だ。かばい続けたレオもここに至り覚悟を固
めたようだ
new:
Leo's teams decisive actions successfully achieved the glorious feat of defeating Zuhl. However, they inadvertently allowed the emergence of a new Ark. But the biggest incident occurred in Leo's absence at the temple.

The temple had allowed the invasion of monsters. And to make matters worse, the monsters' destructive activities were just a diversion.

Unbelievably, the enemy's objective was the kidnapping of Mysial. It was not surprising that the knight's order, who had strengthened the security in the temple, was outmaneuvered.

At the center of the enemy, managing the monsters, was the Arisen Iris. Most people found her presence reliable, and no one could have imagined she was on the enemy's side.

Iris demanded the exchange of Zuhl's life for Mysial. Leo, who had protected her all this time, seemed to have made up his mind.
